Dear All,

We (E. Haasdijk, S. Nolfi, A.E. Eiben and myself) acted as guest=
 editors
for a special issue on Evolutionary Robotics published in Springer=
's
Evolutionary Intelligence journal.

If you are interested, details are b=
elow.

Cheers,

Nicolas

nger.com/journal/12065/7/2?wt_mc=3Dalerts.TOCjournals
